column1: Table 2c. Somalia: General Government Operations, 2019-2022 Q2
Total          Total                  Q1      Q2           Q3       Q4        Total          Q1            Q2
Tax on income, profit, and capital gains                             12.3           12.7                   2.9     3.4          3.8      4.8        14.9          4.2           4.3
Taxes on international trade and transactions                        156.4          139.9                 39.8    34.7      42.6        42.9       160.1         41.8          39.8
Transfers to sub-national governments & Banadir Region                 55.5           84.5                   9.4     7.4      14.0        13.3        44.1         12.1          27.3
Sources: Somali authorities; and IMF Staff estimates.
1/ Unconsolidated basis. Aggregates the fiscal accounts of the Federal Government of Somalia, Puntland, Galmudug, Hirshabelle, South West, and Jubaland. The numbers are based on
preliminary reports from FMS and are subject to revision. The fiscal operations are recorded on a cash basis.
2/ Reporting on these categories commenced in 2020 reporting.
3/ Transfer from FGS to Banadir region is not included.
4/ Advances and transfers to MDAs are not included.
